review: What can you say about Apple TV?... It works as expected. I have one mounted on the back of every TV in our house. It streams movies, pictures and music seamlessly from any Mac or PC with iTunes on it. It runs Netflix and other cloud services flawlessly. You can use any iDevice as a remote to get around the annoying line-of-sight Apple provided RF remote issue. What else could you ask for? This device has definitely won the Cable vs. Cloud battle in our house. Frustratingly the YouTube app has disappeared from the home screen, but you can use AirPlay from any iDevice to still watch YouTube on it.
author: Brian Zuvich
